Qval 1.2.4
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Reference

    All functions

    att.hierarchy()

    Iterative Attribute Hierarchy Exploration Methods for Cognitive Diagnosis Models

    CDM()

    Parameter Estimation for Cognitive Diagnosis Models (CDMs) by MMLE/EM or MMLE/BM Algorithm.

    extract()

    Extract Components from Qval Package Objects

    fit()

    Calculate Fit Indices

    get.beta()

    Calculate \(\beta\)

    get.Mmatrix()

    Calculate \(\mathbf{M}\) matrix

    get.priority()

    Priority of Attribute

    get.PVAF()

    Calculate PVAF

    get.R2()

    Calculate McFadden Pseudo-R2

    get.Rmatrix()

    Restriction Matrix

    is.Qident()

    Check Whether a Q-Matrix is Identifiable

    plot(<CDM>) plot(<sim.data>) plot(<validation>)

    Plot Methods for Various Qval Objects

    print(<CDM>) print(<validation>) print(<sim.data>) print(<fit>) print(<is.Qident>) print(<att.hierarchy>) print(<summary.CDM>) print(<summary.validation>) print(<summary.sim.data>) print(<summary.fit>) print(<summary.is.Qident>) print(<summary.att.hierarchy>)

    Print Methods for Various Objects

    sim.data()

    Generate Response

    sim.MQ()

    Simulate Mis-specifications in Q-matrix

    sim.Q()

    Generate a Random Q-matrix

    summary(<CDM>) summary(<validation>) summary(<sim.data>) summary(<fit>) summary(<is.Qident>) summary(<att.hierarchy>)

    Summary Methods for Various Objects

    update()

    Update Method for Various Objects

    validation()

    Perform Q-matrix Validation Methods

    Wald.test()

    Wald Test for Two Q-vectors

    zOSR()

    Calculate Over-Specification Rate (OSR)

    zQRR()

    Calculate Q-matrix Recovery Rate (QRR)

    zTNR()

    Calculate True-Negative Rate (TNR)

    zTPR()

    Calculate True-Positive Rate (TPR)

    zUSR()

    Calculate Under-Specification Rate (USR)

    zVRR()

    Calculate Vector Recovery Ratio (VRR)
